Names of more men released in Maine Zumba studio prostitution case

The men whose names were released today are from New Hampshire and Boston, but not from Kennebunk, Maine where the studio was located. (AP)

Slain Boston Police officer honored

A new memorial in the Back Bay honors Roy J. Sergei, who died 25 years ago today, after he was shot to death pursuing a gunman. Pictured is Sergei's widow, Maryellen, at the ceremony. (Globe)
